p.d: A former watersports star is killed in his sailing club. Who could have wanted the death of someone admired by an entire region and hero to several generations of sailors? Directed by: Stéphane Franchet (season 3, France, 2018) Screenplay: Sandra Tosello, Fabrice de Costil Cast: Astrid Veillon (Léa Soler), Stéphane Blancafort (Paul Marchal), Piérick Tournier (Erwan), Nelly Lawson (Camille), François Dominique Blin (Franck Marvaud), Sarah-Cheyenne (Alice), Guillemette Barioz (Sophie Vannier), Titouan Laporte (Thomas), Romain Debouchaud (Julien Garrido), Pascal Gimenez (Grégory), Fabien BaIardi (Julien Garnier), Romain Paul (Ludovic Belko), Rosalie Comby (AnaIs Varzay) Genre: detective
